projectContext.configResetInfo: All settings are going to be reset, except label and description.
projectContext.selectProjectInfo: Select the target project for the new item first, then you can configure it here.

CustomIdentifierInput.helperDescription: An unique identifier, e.g. `my-new-element`. This identifier is used for references and URLs.

validations.invalid: Only following characters (ranges) are allowed in a valid ID: a - z, A - Z, 0 - 9, _, -
validations.unique: Identifier must be unique. The entered identifier is already used for another item.

DataPreview.noAttributes: No attributes found. This might be an empty dataset.
DataPreview.typeSelectionTooltip: The data source consists of multiple types. Select one type from the list for a preview. There are max. 1000 types fetched at any time.

count.comment: The count of profiled values. Note that usually only a sample of the dataset is profiled, i.e., the total number of values in the dataset may be higher
count.label: Count

distribution.comment: The distribution of values. Depending on the data type the histogram can be interpreted differently. For interval scaled types this is usually the histogram from the min to the max value.
distribution.label: Distribution

max.comment: The largest value of all profiled values. The representation of the value can be normalized, depending on the detected data type.
max.label: Max. value

maxStrLength.comment: The longest string length in number of characters.
maxStrLength.label: Length (max)

mean.comment: The arithmetic mean of all profiled values. The representation of the value can be normalized, depending on the detected data type.
mean.label: Mean value

meanStrLength.comment: The average string length in number of characters of all profiled values.
meanStrLength.label: Length (avg)

min.comment: The smallest value of all profiled values. The representation of the value can be normalized, depending on the detected data type.
min.label: Min. value

minStringLength.comment: The shortest string length in number of characters.
minStringLength.label: Length (min)

profilingTimestamp.comment: The time the profiling information was extracted from the data source.
profilingTimestamp.label: Profiling timestamp

regexPatterns.comment: A set of extracted regular expression patterns that cover all of the profiled values.
regexPatterns.label: Regex patterns

samples.comment: Values sampled from all profiled values. Usually this sample is uniformly selected from the set of unique values. The representation of the values can be normalized, depending on the detected data type.
samples.label: Samples

DeleteModal.confirmMsg: The {{itemType}} '{{name}}' is used by other items! Deleting this item will also delete all depending items listed below:
DeleteModal.projectNote: All contained items will be deleted, too.

FileUploader.retryMessage: Something going wrong during upload process for {{fileName}}
FileUploader.uploadError: An upload error has occurred for file '{{fileName}}'. Details: {{errorDetails}}

Metadata.unsavedMetaDataWarning: There are unsaved changes that will be lost. Do you still want to proceed?

OverwriteModal.overwriteFile: File '{{fileName}}' already exists. Do you want to overwrite it?

PrefixDialog.prefixNameInvalid: The prefix name you have entered is invalid
PrefixDialog.prefixUriInvalid: The entered URI prefix must be a valid URI / IRI.
PrefixDialog.prefixUriInvalidChar: The entered URI prefix contains invalid characters. First invalid character at position {{idx}} is '{{char}}'.

ProjectImportModal.responseInvalid: Invalid response received from project upload. Project import cannot proceed.
ProjectImportModal.restoreNotice: Want to restore an existing project?
ProjectImportModal.title: Project import
ProjectImportModal.warningExistingProject: A project with the same ID already exists! Choose to either overwrite the existing project or import the project under a freshly generated ID.

RecentlyViewedModal.placeholder: Search recently viewed items or in workspace
RecentlyViewedModal.title: Quick search

dataTypes.projectDesc: Projects let you group related items. All items that depend on each other need to be in the same project.

messages.taskOverwrittenPrompt: I understand that some tasks will be overwritten

validations.float: must be a valid floating point number
validations.integer: must be a valid integer number
validations.parameter: Parameter validation failed. Please fix the issues first.

error.networkFileUpload: Can't upload file '{{fileName}}', please check your connection and try again

not.markdown: Sorry but we can't find the markdown information for this report

di.datasetsTooltip: Shows the list of all datasets across all build projects.
di.projectsTooltip: Shows the list of all data-integration build projects.
di.activitiesTooltip: Shows the list of all data-integration build activities
di.workflowsTooltip: Shows the list of all workflows across all build projects.

side.diBrowseTooltip: Used to manage data-integration projects to build a knowledge graph from existing datasources

dm.exploreTooltip: A generic RDF graph data browser and editor.
dm.queryTooltip: Used to write, store, describe, search and run SPARQL queries.
dm.vocabTooltip: Shows the list of all managed vocabularies. It let's you (un-)install vocabularies from RDF files or the integrated catalog.

notFound.text: The page you requested does not exist.
notFound.title: Page not found

workspace.empty: Your workspace is empty. In order to start, create a new project or import an existing project from an exported project file.

delete.label: Remove edge
delete.tooltip: Removes the edge. Alternatively you can delete (multiple) selected rule elements by pressing the [←] (backspace) key on the keyboard.

evaluation.noResults: No linking results available. Please add reference links.

scoreWidget.noScoreTooltip: No linking evaluation score available. Add positive and/or negative reference links in order to show a score
scoreWidget.referenceLinks: Open reference links UI in new tab

delete.label: Remove selected nodes
delete.tooltip: Removes all selected nodes and connected edges. Alternatively you can delete (multiple) selected rule elements by pressing the [←] (backspace) key on the keyboard.

clone.label: Clone selected nodes
clone.tooltip: Clones all selected nodes and inter-connections and inserts them as new selection. Following key combination also triggers this action: CTRL/CMD + d

sidebar.cycleTooltip: Cycle through {{totalMatches}} current usages of this operator
sidebar.searchTooltip: Search for rule operators and input paths.

toolbar.readOnly: Read-only mode is enabled. No saving possible.

fetchTaskData.msg: An error has occurred while fetching the linking task.

fetchLinkingRuleOperatorDetails.msg: An error has occurred while fetching the list of linking rule operators.

fetchLinkingPaths.msg: Could not fetch source paths for linking task.

missingPathsInCache.msg: Input path '{{inputPath}}' is not available in the cache. Please save the rule in order for the caches to add the missing paths.

errors.loadExternalOperators: Could not load operator list for tab '{{tabName}}'!

warnings.unsavedChanges: There are unsaved changes. Do you still want to close the rule editor?

fetchTransformRule.msg: An error has occurred while fetching the transform rule.

fetchTransformRuleOperatorDetails.msg: An error has occurred while fetching the list of transform rule operators.

createdBy.description: The user who created the item.
createdBy.label: Created by

datasetFileResource.description: The file resource of a file based dataset.
datasetFileResource.label: Dataset file

datasetType.description: The concrete type of a dataset, e.g. its data model and format etc.
datasetType.label: Dataset type

lastModifiedBy.description: The user who last modified the item.
lastModifiedBy.label: Last modified by

taskType.description: The concrete type of a task.
taskType.label: Task type

transformInputResource.description: In case the input is a file resource based dataset, these are the file names of these resources.
transformInputResource.label: Transformed file resource

workflowExecutionStatus.description: Allows to filter by the status of the last execution of the workflow.
workflowExecutionStatus.label: Last execution status

FileWidget.empty: No files are found, add them here to use it later
FileWidget.removeFromDatasets: File '{{fileName}}' is in use by following items:
FileWidget.removeText: Do you really want to delete file

LinkingRuleConfigWidget.fetchError: An error occurred while fetching the linkage rule configuration.

linkType.label: Link type
linkType.description: The property URI of the link. For RDF based datasets this will be the property that connects the linked resources.

limit.label: Target link limit
limit.description: If set to an number N, then per source entity only for the N best matching target resources links will be generated.

LinkingRuleConfigWidget.saveError: An error has occurred while saving the linkage rule config.
LinkingRuleConfigWidget.title: Configuration: Linkage rule

activityControl.viewCachedData: View cached data in new tab

errorReport.fetchReport: Fetching activity execution error report has failed.

sidebar.searchTooltip: Search for datasets and workflow operators both in the nodes used in the canvas and new tasks in the sidebar. Pressing the <Enter> key refreshes the list from the server.
sidebar.cycleTooltip: Cycle through {{totalMatches}} currently used instances of this task

header.saveBtnTooltip: Save the current state of the workflow

warning.tooltip: Focuses on failed node and opens execution report

header.warningMenuTooltip: Show list of errors and warnings

configuration.label: Configuration input
configuration.tooltip: Values passed here will be used to reconfigure the operator parameters. The attribute names must match the name of the parameters to be reconfigured. It's possible to configure a subset of all available parameters.

delete.label: Remove edge
delete.tooltip: Removes the edge. Alternatively you can delete (multiple) selected workflow elements by pressing the [←] (backspace) key on the keyboard.

errors.WorkflowEditor_fetchTaskList: Could not fetch available workflow datasets and operators.

toggleConfigPort.label: Toggle config port
toggleConfigPort.description: Show or hide config port that allows to re-configure parameters of this workflow node by inputting a single flat entity/row with properties matching the parameter IDs. Parameter IDs are listed in the documentation of the corresponding DataIntegration plugin.

warnings.unsavedChanges: There are unsaved changes. Do you still want to close the workflow editor?

config.title: Configuration: Define properties to compare between entities of each data source

errors.fetchAutoCompletionResult: An error occurred while trying to fetch path auto-completions.
errors.invalidPath: The path you have entered is invalid.

manualSelection.title: Add property paths pair
manualSelection.info: Specify property paths to be compared.
manualSelection.cannotAdd: At least one paths is not valid.

entitiyPair.title: Selected properties to compare entities
entitiyPair.info: Choose properties to compare. Select from the suggestions or add them by specifying property paths for both entities.

suggestions.title: Add suggestions
suggestions.foundSuggestions_plural: Found {{count}} comparison suggestions. Add them in the order you want to see them in the entity comparision later.
suggestions.emptyList: No suggestions available. You can add further comparison pairs manually by connection their property paths.

bestLearnedRule.title: Top-performing learned rule (Score: {{score}})
bestLearnedRule.titleTooltip: The best rule that has been learned so far. The performance score ranges from 0.0 (worst) to 1.0 (best).
bestLearnedRule.noRule: No rule has been learned yet. You need to confirm/decline at least three candidate links for a rule to be learned.
bestLearnedRule.showRuleFullscreen: Show best learned rule in full-screen mode.

feedback.title: Reference feedback
feedback.confirmDescription: Confirm that the shown entities are a valid link.
feedback.declineDescription: Decline that the shown entities are a valid link.
feedback.uncertainDescription: Positive or negative link reference cannot be decided yet.
feedback.cancel: Cancel selection and show next link candidate.
feedback.couldNotLoadCandidateError: Could not load entity link candidate.
feedback.propertyConfiguration: Configure which properties should be shown for reference feedback
feedback.addToLabel: Select property value to be part of the entity label
feedback.removeFromLabel: Remove property value from entity label

resetDialog.title: Reset learning session
resetDialog.description: This will reset the current learning session, e.g. changes made to the reference links and the configuration.

saveDialog.title: Save reference links and/or best learned rule

saveReferenceLinks.label: Save reference links
saveReferenceLinks.referenceLinksInfoMessage: There are {{nr}} new, updated or deleted reference links that will be saved.

bestLearnedRule.label: Save best learned rule
bestLearnedRule.noBestLearnedRuleMessage: No best learned rule exists so far.

saveDialog.saveFailureMessage: Saving the rule and/or the reference links has failed.

sessionExistsModal.title: Existing session detected
sessionExistsModal.description: There is already an existing session running that you did not participate in, yet. Please be cautious.

statistics.fetchError: Could not fetch active learning session infos.
statistics.users: Following users have contributed to the current active learning session:
